column1: @imarun_11 @NPCI_NPCI @TheOfficialSBI We are working to enable SBI on #UPI.
@UPI_NPCI Hope @HDFC_Bank and @TheOfficialSBI (2 of Top 5 Banks) will soon onboard the #UPI wagon.
@UPI_NPCI HDFC not in your list, but getting messages from HDFC bank to generate VPA. Fake or a fraud. @HDFC_Bank @HDFCBank_Cares
@UPI_NPCI @TheOfficialSBI hope You will take care of those who don't insert their sim in smartphones. Like me.
